attributes.additional_details: Boris managed to bring a level of order to the country despit facing many of the hardest challenges of any PM in living memory.  Boris is clearly the only option as there is no alternative government capable of retiring order and pride back to our nation

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or replaced.

In any case, decisions about changes to the leaders of political parties are a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
